name: Border
desc: The object for setting borders for component sides or tables.

items.name: all
items.desc: Defines the stroke properties of the border. Stroke properties cannot be set for each side; the border can only be disabled or enabled for each side.

items.name: bottom
items.desc: Indicates whether the border should be applied to the bottom.

items.name: left
items.desc: Indicates whether the border should be applied to the left side.

items.name: right
items.desc: Indicates whether the border should be applied to the right side.

items.name: top
items.desc: Indicates whether the border should be applied to the top.
